body_html:
@jart @slacy The tf.estimator.export.build_raw_serving_input_receiver_fn was using:

t.name.split(':')[0]

so it is fine although I think it might make sense to change it to

t.op.name

as well. This will make it easy to maintain later.

I updated the PR #12759 and also added the test case to cover tf.estimator.export.build_raw_serving_input_receiver_fn as well. Please take a look.
body_text:
@jart @slacy The tf.estimator.export.build_raw_serving_input_receiver_fn was using:
t.name.split(':')[0]

so it is fine although I think it might make sense to change it to
t.op.name

as well. This will make it easy to maintain later.
I updated the PR #12759 and also added the test case to cover tf.estimator.export.build_raw_serving_input_receiver_fn  as well. Please take a look.
body:
@jart @slacy The `tf.estimator.export.build_raw_serving_input_receiver_fn` was using:
```
t.name.split(':')[0]
```
so it is fine although I think it might make sense to change it to
```
t.op.name
```
 as well. This will make it easy to maintain later.

I updated the PR #12759 and also added the test case to cover `tf.estimator.export.build_raw_serving_input_receiver_fn`  as well. Please take a look.
